movie: <电影名>鬼屋 The Haunted House</电影名> <年份>1921</年份> <评分>7.8</评分> <封面>https://img2.doubanio.com/view/photo/s_ratio_poster/public/p1827655283.jpg</封面> <导演>爱德华·克莱因 / 巴斯特·基顿</导演> <演员>巴斯特·基顿 / 弗吉尼亚·福克斯 / 乔·罗伯茨 / 爱德华·克莱因 / Dorothy Cassil / Mark Hamilton / 娜塔莉·塔尔梅奇</演员> <简介>The Haunted House is a 1921 short comedy film starring comedian Buster Keaton. It was written and directed by Keaton and Edward F. Cline. The runtime is 21 minutes. One of the more memorable sequences of the film involves bank teller Buster spilling glue all over his counter, reminiscent of a scene in his first film The Butcher Boy.</简介>
